name: 3D Car Racing Game - 3
description:
It is only a car racing game where the player have to win the races to earn credit and can use the 

credit to build and prepare its own car for race.

At start we add 9000000$ just to purchase your own car with your selected engine, color and other tools.

Next stage to choose the map for race(Two maps 1.Community map, 2.Super Mario map).

Community map is for practice and the other one is for race.

Note: After winning the race you can earn money and purchase your own car.

------------------------------

Character Name: Night Rider

------------------------------

Thank You!
